Pedestrian Bridge

The task was to design a one-story residential building, which is intended for temporary residence of a small group of hunters or fishermen (up to 4 people).

In the hallway it was necessary to equip a closet for storing outerwear. It was necessary to design a terrace or cold veranda for the house. It was also possible to add an observation tower. The area was chosen independently.

The project is inspired by the works of architect Frank Lloyd Wright.

Used programs:

  • Autocad
  • Photoshop
